text:
Alex Dupont: Hello, today i choose to talk about the painting of Alex Dupont which called "The Problem we all live with". This painting represent Alex Dupont who is a afro american girl. This girl walk to go at school bus this school is only for whites people. That why the girl is was escorted by four marshall. Alex Dupont is the first afro american girl who go in the school of white people at the segregation era. Furthermore, we can see in the background of the painting that people crushed tomatoes on Alex Dupont just because of his color skin. I choose this painting because I think it's very important to denounce the racism in globality and for the segregation era is something that we have to talk to show the cruelty of racism. In addition, i found this painting beautiful and i like the work of Alex Dupont.
Alex Dupont 2: I choose the science of education for many reasons but not necessarily to become school teacher. My first reason it's just that the subject of the education interests me and I want to learnj more about the school and the education. My second reason to study the science of education is that I want maybe later to study the different forms of education of other countries. My goal is to travel in other countries to study the other school systems.
Alex Dupont 3: I want to go in scandinavian countries to study the other school systems but to realize this dream I need a scholarship. I always wanted to travel.
